card.name: Isperia, Supreme Judge
card.property: Flying Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, you may draw a card.

card.name: Azorius Herald
card.property: Azorius Herald can't be blocked. When Azorius Herald enters, you gain 4 life. When Azorius Herald enters, sacrifice it unless {U} was spent to cast it.

card.name: Azorius Justiciar
card.property: When Azorius Justiciar enters, detain up to two target creatures your opponents control. (Until your next turn, those creatures can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)

card.name: Stoic Ephemera
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Flying When Stoic Ephemera blocks, sacrifice it at end of combat.

card.name: Court Hussar
card.property: Vigilance When Court Hussar enters, look at the top three cards of your library, then put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. When Court Hussar enters, sacrifice it unless {W} was spent to cast it.

card.name: Hover Barrier
card.property: Defender, flying

card.name: Archon of the Triumvirate
card.property: Flying Whenever Archon of the Triumvirate attacks, detain up to two target nonland permanents your opponents control. (Until your next turn, those permanents can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)

card.name: Azorius Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn. • Draw a card. • Put target attacking or blocking creature on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Azorius Guildmage
Detention Sphere
card.property: When Detention Sphere enters, you may exile target nonland permanent not named Detention Sphere and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent. When Detention Sphere leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.

card.name: Dovescape
card.property: ({W/U} can be paid with either {W} or {U}.) Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, counter that spell. That player creates X 1/1 white and blue Bird creature tokens with flying, where X is the spell's mana value.

card.name: Dramatic Rescue
card.property: Return target creature to its owner's hand. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Isperia the Inscrutable
card.property: Flying Whenever Isperia the Inscrutable deals combat damage to a player, choose a card name. That player reveals their hand. If a card with the chosen name is revealed this way, search your library for a creature card with flying, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Judge's Familiar
card.property: Flying Sacrifice Judge's Familiar: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}.

card.name: Lavinia of the Tenth
card.property: Protection from red When Lavinia of the Tenth enters, detain each nonland permanent your opponents control with mana value 4 or less. (Until your next turn, those permanents can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)

card.name: Lyev Skyknight
card.property: Flying When Lyev Skyknight enters, detain target nonland permanent an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that permanent can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)

card.name: Pride of the Clouds
card.property: Flying Pride of the Clouds gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield with flying. Forecast — {2}{W}{U}, Reveal Pride of the Clouds from your hand: Create a 1/1 white and blue Bird creature token with flying. (Activate only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)

card.name: Render Silent
card.property: Counter target spell. Its controller can't cast spells this turn.

card.name: Sky Hussar
card.property: Flying When Sky Hussar enters, untap all creatures you control. Forecast — Tap two untapped white and/or blue creatures you control, Reveal Sky Hussar from your hand: Draw a card. (Activate only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)

card.name: Skymark Roc
card.property: Flying Whenever Skymark Roc attacks, you may return target creature defending player controls with toughness 2 or less to its owner's hand.

card.name: Sphinx's Revelation
card.property: You gain X life and draw X cards.

card.name: Windreaver
card.property: Flying {W}: Windreaver gains vigilance until end of turn. {W}: Windreaver gets +0/+1 until end of turn. {U}: Switch Windreaver's power and toughness until end of turn. {U}: Return Windreaver to its owner's hand.

card.name: Azorius Keyrune
card.property: {T}: Add {W} or {U}. {W}{U}: Azorius Keyrune becomes a 2/2 white and blue Bird artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

card.name: Azorius Chancery
card.property: Azorius Chancery enters tapped. When Azorius Chancery enters, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {W}{U}.

card.name: Teysa, Orzhov Scion
card.property: Sacrifice three white creatures: Exile target creature. Whenever another black creature you control dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Belfry Spirit
card.property: Flying Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.) When Belfry Spirit enters or the creature it haunts dies, create two 1/1 black Bat creature tokens with flying.

card.name: Martyred Rusalka
card.property: {W}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature can't attack this turn.

card.name: Keening Banshee
card.property: Flying When Keening Banshee enters, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Plagued Rusalka
card.property: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Pontiff of Blight
card.property: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) Other creatures you control have extort. (If a creature has multiple instances of extort, each triggers separately.)

card.name: Skeletal Vampire
card.property: Flying When Skeletal Vampire enters, create two 1/1 black Bat creature tokens with flying. {3}{B}{B}, Sacrifice a Bat: Create two 1/1 black Bat creature tokens with flying. Sacrifice a Bat: Regenerate Skeletal Vampire.

card.name: Stab Wound
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -2/-2. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player loses 2 life.

card.name: Ultimate Price
card.property: Destroy target monocolored creature.

card.name: Angel of Despair
card.property: Flying When Angel of Despair enters, destroy target permanent.

card.name: Deathpact Angel
card.property: Flying When Deathpact Angel dies, create a 1/1 white and black Cleric creature token. It has "{3}{W}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Return a card named Deathpact Angel from your graveyard to the battlefield."

card.name: Debtors' Knell
card.property: ({W/B} can be paid with either {W} or {B}.) At the beginning of your upkeep, put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Ghost Council of Orzhova
card.property: When Ghost Council of Orzhova enters, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Exile Ghost Council of Orzhova. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: One Thousand Lashes
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player loses 1 life.

card.name: Orzhov Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Return target creature you control and all Auras you control attached to it to their owner's hand. • Destroy target creature and you lose life equal to its toughness. • Return target creature card with mana value 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Orzhov Pontiff
card.property: Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.) When Orzhov Pontiff enters or the creature it haunts dies, choose one — • Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. • Creatures you don't control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Pillory of the Sleepless
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block. Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life."

card.name: Sin Collector
card.property: When Sin Collector enters, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose an instant or sorcery card from it and exile that card.

card.name: Treasury Thrull
card.property: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) Whenever Treasury Thrull attacks, you may return target artifact, creature, or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Vizkopa Guildmage
Orzhov Basilica
card.property: Orzhov Basilica enters tapped. When Orzhov Basilica enters, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {W}{B}.

card.name: Rakdos, Lord of Riots
card.property: You can't cast this spell unless an opponent lost life this turn. Flying, trample Creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each 1 life your opponents have lost this turn.

card.name: Crypt Champion
card.property: Double strike When Crypt Champion enters, each player puts a creature card with mana value 3 or less from their graveyard onto the battlefield. When Crypt Champion enters, sacrifice it unless {R} was spent to cast it.

card.name: Thrill-Kill Assassin
card.property: Deathtouch Unleash (You may have this creature enter with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Cackling Flames
card.property: Cackling Flames deals 3 damage to any target. Hellbent — Cackling Flames deals 5 damage instead if you have no cards in hand.

card.name: Demonfire
card.property: Demonfire deals X damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead. Hellbent — If you have no cards in hand, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.

card.name: Rakdos Pit Dragon
card.property: {R} {R}: Rakdos Pit Dragon gains flying until end of turn. {R}: Rakdos Pit Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Hellbent — Rakdos Pit Dragon has double strike as long as you have no cards in hand.

card.name: Splatter Thug
card.property: First strike Unleash (You may have this creature enter with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Utvara Hellkite
card.property: Flying Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, create a 6/6 red Dragon creature token with flying.

card.name: Auger Spree
card.property: Target creature gets +4/-4 until end of turn.

card.name: Avatar of Discord
card.property: ({B/R} can be paid with either {B} or {R}.) Flying When Avatar of Discord enters, sacrifice it unless you discard two cards.

card.name: Carnival Hellsteed
card.property: First strike, haste Unleash (You may have this creature enter with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Dreadbore
card.property: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Jagged Poppet
card.property: Whenever Jagged Poppet is dealt damage, discard that many cards. Hellbent — Whenever Jagged Poppet deals combat damage to a player, if you have no cards in hand, that player discards cards equal to the damage.

card.name: Lyzolda, the Blood Witch
card.property: {2}, Sacrifice a creature: Lyzolda, the Blood Witch deals 2 damage to any target if the sacrificed creature was red. Draw a card if the sacrificed creature was black.

card.name: Master of Cruelties
card.property: First strike, deathtouch Master of Cruelties can only attack alone. Whenever Master of Cruelties attacks a player and isn't blocked, that player's life total becomes 1. Master of Cruelties assigns no combat damage this combat.

card.name: Rakdos Cackler
card.property: Unleash (You may have this creature enter with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Rakdos Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Exile target player's graveyard. • Destroy target artifact. • Each creature deals 1 damage to its controller.

card.name: Rakdos Guildmage
card.property: ({B/R} can be paid with either {B} or {R}.) {3}{B}, Discard a card: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. {3}{R}: Create a 2/1 red Goblin creature token with haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Rakdos Shred-Freak
card.property: Haste

card.name: Rakdos the Defiler
card.property: Flying, trample Whenever Rakdos the Defiler attacks, sacrifice half the non-Demon permanents you control, rounded up. Whenever Rakdos deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices half the non-Demon permanents they control, rounded up.

card.name: Rakdos's Return
card.property: Rakdos's Return deals X damage to target opponent or planeswalker. That player or that planeswalker's controller discards X cards.

card.name: Riot Spikes
card.property: ({B/R} can be paid with either {B} or {R}.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/-1.

card.name: Wrecking Ball
card.property: Destroy target creature or land.

card.name: Rakdos Keyrune
card.property: {T}: Add {B} or {R}. {B}{R}: Rakdos Keyrune becomes a 3/1 black and red Devil artifact creature with first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Rakdos Carnarium
card.property: Rakdos Carnarium enters tapped. When Rakdos Carnarium enters, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {B}{R}.

card.name: Ruric Thar, the Unbowed
card.property: Vigilance, reach Ruric Thar, the Unbowed attacks each combat if able. Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, Ruric Thar deals 6 damage to that player.

card.name: Skarrgan Firebird
card.property: Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters with three +1/+1 counters on it.) Flying {R}{R}{R}: Return Skarrgan Firebird from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only if an opponent was dealt damage this turn.

card.name: Birds of Paradise
card.property: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Protean Hulk
card.property: When Protean Hulk dies, search your library for any number of creature cards with total mana value 6 or less, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Skarrgan Pit-Skulk
card.property: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters with a +1/+1 counter on it.) Creatures with power less than Skarrgan Pit-Skulk's power can't block it.

card.name: Wasteland Viper
card.property: Deathtouch Bloodrush — {G}, Discard Wasteland Viper: Target attacking creature gets +1/+2 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Wurmweaver Coil
card.property: Enchant green creature Enchanted creature gets +6/+6. {G}{G}{G}, Sacrifice Wurmweaver Coil: Create a 6/6 green Wurm creature token.

card.name: Borborygmos
card.property: Trample Whenever Borborygmos deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Burning-Tree Emissary
card.property: When Burning-Tree Emissary enters, add {R}{G}.

card.name: Burning-Tree Shaman
card.property: Whenever a player activates an ability that isn't a mana ability, Burning-Tree Shaman deals 1 damage to that player.

card.name: Ghor-Clan Rampager
card.property: Trample Bloodrush — {R}{G}, Discard Ghor-Clan Rampager: Target attacking creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Giant Solifuge
card.property: ({R/G} can be paid with either {R} or {G}.) Trample; haste; shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

card.name: Gruul Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Creatures without flying can't block this turn. • Gain control of all permanents you own. • Gruul Charm deals 3 damage to each creature with flying.

card.name: Pit Fight
card.property: Target creature you control fights another target creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

card.name: Rubblebelt Raiders
card.property: Whenever Rubblebelt Raiders attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each attacking creature you control.

card.name: Rubblehulk
card.property: Rubblehulk's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control. Bloodrush — {1}{R}{G}, Discard Rubblehulk: Target attacking creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of lands you control.

card.name: Rumbling Slum
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, Rumbling Slum deals 1 damage to each player.

card.name: Savage Twister
card.property: Savage Twister deals X damage to each creature.

card.name: Savageborn Hydra
card.property: Double strike Savageborn Hydra enters with X +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{R/G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Savageborn Hydra. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Scab-Clan Mauler
card.property: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters with two +1/+1 counters on it.) Trample

card.name: Ulasht, the Hate Seed
card.property: Ulasht, the Hate Seed enters with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other red creature you control and a +1/+1 counter on it for each other green creature you control. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Ulasht: Choose one — • Ulasht deals 1 damage to target creature. • Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

card.name: Zhur-Taa Druid
card.property: {T}: Add {G}. Whenever you tap Zhur-Taa Druid for mana, it deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Zhur-Taa Swine
card.property: Bloodrush — {1}{R}{G}, Discard Zhur-Taa Swine: Target attacking creature gets +5/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Gruul Turf
card.property: Gruul Turf enters tapped. When Gruul Turf enters, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {R}{G}.

card.name: Zegana, Utopian Speaker
card.property: When Zegana, Utopian Speaker enters, if you control another creature with a +1/+1 counter on it, draw a card. {4}{G}{U}: Adapt 4. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put four +1/+1 counters on it.) Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

card.name: Cloudfin Raptor
card.property: Flying Evolve (Whenever a creature you control enters, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

card.name: Rapid Hybridization
card.property: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. That creature's controller creates a 3/3 green Frog Lizard creature token.

card.name: Cytoplast Root-Kin
card.property: Graft 4 (This creature enters with four +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.) When Cytoplast Root-Kin enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. {2}: Move a +1/+1 counter from target creature you control onto Cytoplast Root-Kin.

card.name: Experiment One
card.property: Evolve (Whenever a creature you control enters, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) Remove two +1/+1 counters from Experiment One: Regenerate Experiment One. (The next time this creature would be destroyed, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)

card.name: Gyre Sage
card.property: Evolve (Whenever a creature you control enters, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) {T}: Add {G} for each +1/+1 counter on Gyre Sage.

card.name: Miming Slime
card.property: Create an X/X green Ooze creature token, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

card.name: Vinelasher Kudzu
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on Vinelasher Kudzu.

card.name: Coiling Oracle
card.property: When Coiling Oracle enters, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.

card.name: Elusive Krasis
card.property: Elusive Krasis can't be blocked. Evolve (Whenever a creature you control enters, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

card.name: Experiment Kraj
card.property: Experiment Kraj has all activated abilities of each other creature with a +1/+1 counter on it. {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Fathom Mage
card.property: Evolve (Whenever a creature you control enters, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) Whenever a +1/+1 counter is put on Fathom Mage, you may draw a card.

card.name: Momir Vig, Simic Visionary
card.property: Whenever you cast a green creature spell, you may search your library for a creature card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top. Whenever you cast a blue creature spell, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put that card into your hand.

card.name: Nimbus Swimmer
card.property: Flying Nimbus Swimmer enters with X +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Omnibian
card.property: {T}: Target creature becomes a Frog with base power and toughness 3/3 until end of turn.

card.name: Plaxcaster Frogling
card.property: Graft 3 (This creature enters with three +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.) {2}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

card.name: Progenitor Mimic
card.property: You may have Progenitor Mimic enter as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it has "At the beginning of your upkeep, if this creature isn't a token, create a token that's a copy of this creature."

card.name: Simic Sky Swallower
card.property: Flying, trample Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

card.name: Trygon Predator
card.property: Flying Whenever Trygon Predator deals combat damage to a player, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment that player controls.

card.name: Urban Evolution
card.property: Draw three cards. You may play an additional land this turn.

card.name: Voidslime
card.property: Counter target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

card.name: Vorel of the Hull Clade
card.property: {G} {U}, {T}: Double the number of each kind of counter on target artifact, creature, or land.

card.name: Zameck Guildmage
Simic Growth Chamber
card.property: Simic Growth Chamber enters tapped. When Simic Growth Chamber enters, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {G}{U}.
